summary: Set in the 1960s, a magical tale of two 12-year-olds embarking on an adventure to find new, cool parents and escape their neglected, overly adult existence.
cast: Cayden Boyd|Lara Flynn Boyle|Matthew Modine|Noah Grabowski|J.D. Garfield|Johnny Cotugno|Jeff Griffin|Candace Campfield|Mary Evans|AnnaSophia Robb|Mike Miller|Bill Allen|Michael Clark|Boots Southerland|Val Kilmer|Ramsey Scott|Stephen Root|Toby Huss|Sean Brosnan|Jackson Hurst|Argos MacCallum|Tonea Stewart|Mathew Greer|Ashley Fox Linton|Jerry Biggs|Susan Conklin|Brenda Isaacs Booth|Georges Hemund|Dylan McDermott|Heather Graham|Chris Luttrell|Gregory Chase|Ethan Phillips|Elliott Shelton|Breanna Ellis|Bailey Ann Scheller|Kenny Resch|Janet Dey|Jeffrey Jackson|Kiira Arai|Ronald Robert Hamilton|James Johnstone|Geoffrey C. Martin|D'Nette Pennington|Gabriel Sanchez|Dylan Scheller
title: En busca de la felicidad
